DOC.brief_title: High Flow Nasal Cannula Treatment Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.detailed_description: A single center , prospective study . The study would include 30 patient diagnose within past 2 year moderate severe OSA ( AHI > =15 ) Rabin Medical Center ( RMC ) sleep lab , intolerant CPAP treatment . Following signing informed consent form , patient would undergo polysomnography ( PSG ) treat HFNC . The HFNC PSG outcome measure compare baseline PSG do within past 2 year additional PSG connect CPAP device .
